name: Post Drone
description:
In a world above the clouds, an island exists named Coconut City, where the people are in need, their packages need to be delivered in a sustainable way and there is only one robot that's up for the job… Post Drone.

Post Drone explores a future inspired by the current technology of package deliveries by drone using clean energy for a sustainable environment and to satisfy the needs of the consumer in a potential green future

------ HOW TO PLAY -----

W = Accelerate
S = Decelerate
A , D = Turn
Up Arrow = Move Upwards
Down Arrow = Move Downwards

Pick up packages and deliver them to the assigned destination before the timer runs out. Follow the orange highlight for the next objective.
